1.content: You wake up one Saturday morning warm in your bed. You slowly open eyes, expecting to see the sun shining brightly through your window, but instead the window isn't there. In fact, you're not even in your room at all! You instantly jump to your feet and realize you are standing on a massive rug in the middle of a massive room. You realize you're wearing only your underwear as you look around the massive room, trying to figure out where you are. As you look around, you hear thunderous footsteps coming from behind you. You turn around and see ....
1.title: First of all...

12.content:
It takes a few seconds to recognize the man, the sun blinding your view.
It was the handsome internet star Toddy Smith, shirtless, standing before you.
12.title: Toddy Smith

121.content:
He looks at you, grinning evilly. "Well, what do we have here. What happened to you tiny thing."
He leans forward and picks you up and takes a closer look at you. Not knowing his intentions, you plead. "Please don't hurt me, I don't know what happened, just help me get back to normal."
Given the situation and knowing the characteristics of the person before you, you knew that you were going to get help.
But then, a sudden hard laugh deafens your ears. "I've never seen a tiny, you thing I am just going to give you up? And now that I've taken a closer look at you, I know that nobody cares that you suddenly disappeared. I'll be making use of you." He says, grinningly.
He takes you and throws you on the end of the bed. You try to stand up, but you almost fall off the bed when Todd jumps into the bed. "Kneel down there, I am quite tired from hitch-hiking, so you'll be doing something special for me." You don't know what he means, but suddenly two gigantic soles block your vision. "So, what I want you to do is......"
121.title: He notices you

choices: Decide to obey and clean his feet
1211.content:
https://pics.wikifeet.com/Todd-Smith-Fee...
A giant wave of different cheesy smells enter your nostrils. Two size 13 soles tower before you, the sweat dripping from them. The toes are filled with a humongous amount of toejam. "Go on, try to lick all the sweat off my soles, if you're done with that, you'll lick the gunk out my toes. Sound good little foot-boy?" You are speechless, hearing his command. Is he serious?

Obviously not wanting to lick his feet clean, you try to plead and beg again. "Please don't make me do this, I thought that you were kind, like in your youtube videos. Why would you want me to lick your feet clean, that's nasty,"

A laugh erupts again. "Do you really think that I would treat a tiny worthless toy the same way that I treat normal people? Your worthless, you should be thankful for finally giving you a purpose in your life. My toejam is worth more than you. Now clean my feet slave." He puts his feet closer to you. You obviously didn't want to this, but you didn't have a choice. What would he do if you didn't, or is he just bluffing? You....
1211.title: Clean my feet

choices: Let me lie on my stomach so you can lick my whole sole clean
12111.content:
Cleaning his feet was the safest thing to do. You walk forward, entering a zone of musty air from his feet, the smell making you dizzy. You stand before his right foot, looking at the sweaty and filthy sole.

After hesitating for a few seconds, you use your tongue, making contact with the foot. You gag instantly and try to do it inaudiblely, not trying to catch the attention of the giant jock.

You close your eyes and start licking his feet. The sweat of his feet starts pouring into your stomach. You continue to lick the spots that are reachable for your tiny body.
"I see you're obeying me little slave, but you're unfortunately only getting one spot." So....
12111.title: Decide to obey and clean his feet

info.brief_description: An interactive story about being tiny at the feet of your favorite male youtubers.
info.description:
Only MALE YouTubers

When you shrink, please be 2 inches tall or smaller

Anything is open, but please if scat is involved, please limit it

Unaware and Aware

You can only end the chapter by dying somehow (crushed, eaten, etc.)



ENJOY
